The @BardoMovie soundtrack marks the latest collaboration between Bryce Dessner and Alejandro G. Iñárritu, the duo having previously worked together on 'The Revenant' soundtrack in 2015. 

Check out the full tracklist here:
https://t.co/qwHfjv5mnB

urls.title: The Soundtrack to Alejandro G. Iñárritu's 'Bardo' will be released next Friday, featuring Original Score by the National's Bryce Dessner & Alejandro G. Iñárritu - Milan Records
urls.description: Also included on the soundtrack are several needledrops featured in the film, ranging from David Bowie’s “Let’s Dance” to contributions from salsa pioneers Héctor Lavoe and Willie Colón, Mexican pop icon José José, “The King of Cumbia” Andrés Landero, conga drummer Joe Cuba and more.

urls.title: ACO perform piece by The National's guitarist - ABC Radio National
urls.description: The National's guitarist, Bryce Dessner, is making a name for himself as an orchestral composer. He's written a piece that is performed in the ACO's upcoming tour The American, and RN Breakfast was joined by a string quartet for a special live performance of the work.

urls.title: The National’s Bryce Dessner Named Artist-In-Residence At Yale’s Schwarzman Center
urls.description: The National‘s Bryce Dessner is returning to his pre-fame alma mater of Yale as the first Artist-In-Residence at the university’s newly opened Schwarzman Center. Dessner has “curated and commissioned new multi-disciplinary works from a roster of creators” such as Julia Bullock, Ash Fure, Nathalie Joachim, Kaneza Schaal and Anna Thorvaldsdóttir, which will be performed over the next year. He will also hold free master classes for Yale students and alumni.

tweets.text:
.@bryce_dessner announced as first Artist-In-Residence at his alma mater #YaleSchwarzman Center. Dessner has curated and commissioned new works from creators incl. @_JuliaBullock #ashfure @NathalieJoachim #KanezaSchaal & @annathorvalds 
https://t.co/nkV8Z1tOOG

urls.title: 15 concerts inratables pour cet automne
urls.description: Musiques - Comme d'usage, avec le retour des élèves dans les classes, voici celui des musiciens dans les salles après un été de batifolage en plein air. À la différence qu'ici l'office n'est pas en partie assuré par des types trouvés au hasard dans la rue. Il en a fallu des choix cornéliens et des revirements pour vous concocter cette sélection des concerts essentiels à voir absolument cette saison. Ce qui ne signifie pas qu'il faut bouder les autres.

tweets.text:
Thanks for being amazing people, and amazing examples. To @greengloves777 @distantstation @postmoderndrummer @brycedessner @lanzprojects Kyle and @aarondessner I love you guys. Thank you for including me in your world. Until next time✨✌🏾♥️ 
 3/3 https://t.co/65n97dpLUa

✌🏾Last night in Missoula, So beautiful. So gorgeous to play on a mountain and to meet so many kindpeople. Will not forget! We hit again with @TheNational in Ogden Utah. My third time in Utah in the last year 😵‍💫Here’s Us singing mistaken for strangers again! 🤘🏾♥️ https://t.co/U859h7Qryy
@Bartees_Strange @Brassland ❤️❤️❤️

Et ça continue ! 🎉 

« Une histoire de la musique américaine » 🇺🇸 épisode 5 cet après-midi 17h30 🕠 @francemusique 📻

Aujourd’hui, une vraie génération 2.0 du minimalisme : @nicomuhly, @bryce_dessner et @caroshawmusic 🤩

@NonesuchRecords @TheNational 

https://t.co/08bWPIzswm

urls.title: « Génération 2.0 » : Nico Muhly, Bryce Dessner et Caroline Shaw
urls.description: Nico Muhly, Bryce Dessner et Caroline Shaw sont amis, et partagent beaucoup, même dans leurs musiques respectives ! Nico est pianiste, sa musique est vive et jouissive. Bryce est guitariste, il voit ses œuvres comme de la folk sous acide. Caroline est chanteuse et imagine des abysses de nostalgie.

tweets.text: 🥹 c’mon guys ya killin me over here 😭 but seriously. Honored to play shows with The National. Truly https://t.co/O4e5hSFYYn

Chicago Classical Review likens this week's CSO concerts with @esapekkasalonen to a “magnificent dinner” while @pekka_kuusisto gives “one of the most jaw-dropping exhibitions of solo virtuosity seen ... in a long time” in @bryce_dessner's Violin Concerto.
https://t.co/8dtkyiTqbD

@Esapekkasalonen made a triumphant return to the Orchestra Hall podium in Thursday’s CSO concert, while @pekka_kuusisto delivered an incredibly nuanced performance of @bryce_dessner’s Violin Concerto, a bold musical pilgrimage down the Camino del Santiago. 

📷: @toddrphoto https://t.co/EOkmMoYdUd

May 26-31, @esapekkasalonen leads a voyage through Ravel’s setting of Mother Goose and Stravinsky’s 1940s “war symphony,” while Finnish violinist @pekka_kuusisto plays an exhilarating new concerto by @bryce_dessner.

Get tickets → https://t.co/KDqzsB61e5

Online political ads directing to this page are paid for by Planned Parenthood Action Fund or Planned Parenthood Votes, as designated in the relevant online political ad, 123 William St. 10th Fl., NY NY 10038, and are not authorized by any candidate or candidate's committee.

tweets.text: This week,  @OrchestreParis added five Ukrainian musicians to its numbers, members of orchestras in Kyiv and Odessa, ladies who had fled their homeland with their children and their instruments. It was a great privilege to work with them. All orchestras, consider doing the same! https://t.co/Nqtxvk1ayD
